name: Jasper's Pancakes Show!
description:
Play as Jasper, who is a brilliant CHEF??? in a fantastic TV SHOW???

( ! ) NOTE: If you're playing on the HTML5 version of the game and experiencing gamebreaking bugs, please try out the standalone version! (or play in fullscreen mode)

Controls:
W, A, S, D or Up, Left, Down, Right: Move
Left Mouse Click: Continue Dialogue (it is not recommended to spam skip dialogues)
Space: Exit computer screen
F11: Fullscreen (recommended)
Alt+F4: Exit the game

This game was made for the 9th Official Brackeys Game Jam!
